This project provides basic banking facilities such as opening an account, applying for loans, doing transactions. The additional features required for this project was that the user should be able to open an account in any bank or any branch of any bank and same with loans.

This project was developed to reduce human effort and time consumption of a student to apply as well as to get a migration certificate.The students need to clear their dues if not cleared using payment gateway present in the project and then apply for migration certificate.

The organization like a college, company, hotel and etc. have many different resources to manage like Guest Rooms, Cabs, Class Room and etc. This System allow a user to book different types of resources at a particular platform. This system is designed to book resources in terms of days. This system also consist of one availability check engine which checks for the resources status at a particular date. Here resources means Rooms and Cabs where a person is involved physically.

Harsha Trust is a “Not for profit” organization that works with the tribal and the poor in remote locations of Odisha, aiming to bring in human development in remote villages.
This application is divided into 3 modules. I.e. Web App, Android App and Backend API. Manager, Admin and Donor can use the Web App. Supervisor can use the Android App. Only supervisor can enter the data of villagers through Android App, then all data processed in backend then it will display in Web App so that Admin and Manager can view and verify all the data.
